data.eml:eml: A reappraisal of the hermit crab genera Catapagurus A. Milne­ Edwards and Hemipagurus Smith (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Paguridae), with the description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mclaughlin, Patsy A. (2004): A reappraisal of the hermit crab genera Catapagurus A. Milne­ Edwards and Hemipagurus Smith (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Paguridae), with the description of a new species. Zootaxa 433: 1-16, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157394
